alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:20PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Elbert, southeastern Arapahoe and northern Lincoln Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 920 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Cottonwood Valley to 9 miles northwest of Matheson to 6 miles east of Elbert, or along a line extending from 47 miles northwest of Flagler to 19 miles west of Limon to 29 miles northeast of Colorado Springs. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Elbert, Hugo, Simla, Arriba, Genoa, Matheson, Kutch, Agate and Cottonwood Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
